title: Yugi TF
body: We got Baker Pantheon, we're getting Satan Teemo, lets get Yugi TF.{{champion:4}}

replies.body: there's a yusei custom skin for tf
duuuude. omg. i would play twisted fate legit just for that skin, if there was a yugi tf i would buy it on the first day of release. Lets get Rito on here
